nodes.text: Solash was a male Chiss lieutenant of the Hutt Cartel living during the Cold War. In 3643 BBY Eidolon, a former bounty hunter, whose company Eidolon Security was a competitor to the Cartel, became a target of the Great Hunt and Solash posted on the HoloNet a message from Karagga the Unyielding specifically requesting that he should be brought to the Hutt Cartel alive, instead of dead.
Solash appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Bounty Hunter class mission on the planet Nar Shaddaa.
